## buttonCellRenderer variable


**Signature:**

```typescript
buttonCellRenderer: (title: any, clickHandler: any) => {
    field: string;
    width: number;
    pinned: string;
    enableCellChangeFlash: boolean;
    cellStyle: {
        padding: string;
        lineHeight: string;
    };
    filter: boolean;
    suppressFiltersToolPanel: boolean;
    suppressColumnsToolPanel: boolean;
    headerName: string;
    minWidth: number;
    maxWidth: number;
    resizable: boolean;
    cellRendererSelector: (params: any) => {
        component: string;
        params: {
            actionClick: any;
            actionName: any;
            appearance: string;
        };
    };
}
```
